solution.text:
Volume of the cone formed when the triangle is revolved about side \(_{j}_\,cm, V_1=_{{trunc(((1/Decimal(3))*pi_val*j**2*k),3)}}_\,cm^3\)
Volume of the cone formed when the triangle is revolved about side \(_{k}_\,cm, V_2=_{{trunc(((1/Decimal(3))*pi_val*k**2*j),3)}}_\,cm^3\)
Difference between the two volume \(=V_2-V_1\)
\(=_{{trunc(((1/Decimal(3))*pi_val*k**2*j),3)}}_-_{{trunc(((1/Decimal(3))*pi_val*j**2*k),3)}}_\)
\(=_{{trunc(((1/Decimal(3))*pi_val*j*k*(k-j)),3)}}_\,cm^3\)

content.text: What is the difference between the two volumes?
